channel.title: Asif Mammadov's Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content on Asif Mammadov's Personal Page

item.title: Using Traefik as a reverse proxy
item.description: A reverse proxy is a server that acts as an intermediary between a client and one or more servers. It can help with load balancing, SSL termination, caching, and many other tasks. One of the most popular tools for setting up a reverse proxy is Traefik. It has a rich set of features, is fast to configure, and is highly flexible for custom functionality and integration. This post will follow the steps to set up a reverse proxy using Traefik.

item.title: Setting Up Self-Signed Certificate on Windows
item.description: Self-signed certificates are public key certificates used in testing environments. They are not issued by Certificate Authority (CA) and thus do not provide any trust. Yet they are free and easy to create, which is an excellent option for testing applications with endpoints over HTTPS. There are several ways to create a certificate on Windows: OpenSSL, makecert, Windows Certificate Manager (Certmgr), and Powershell’s New-SelfSignedCertificate cmdlet. I will use the latter in this post as it is built-in in Powershell and utilizes CLI.

item.title: CV
item.description: Experience # Software Engineer 2022-08 - present Simbrella — Mobile Fintech Services Baku, Azerbaijan Fintech company that developes financial services for Financial Institutions, Mobile Wallets and MNOs to offer loans to massive segments of untapped customers. We provide digital and instant financial services and reduce cost of risk applying AI-based models to efficiently assess customers’ creditworthiness. Main contributor to development of internal End-to-End testing framework that reduced amount of deployment incidents and bugs by 80% saving over 40 thousands of dollars per quarter.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Team lead, Developer 2022-04 - 2022-02 Music2Notes (application) — Web app that transcribes songs to sheet music. Express.js, React.js, Socket.io, CI/CD, Heroku Developer 2021-05 - 2021-06 Conway's Game of Life (application) — CLI and GUI (with SDL) for the evolutionary cellular automation devised by Mr.
